title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: An unexpected opportunity could help you heal a sore spot regarding money. People often think any financial problem can be easily solved by simply increasing revenue. Unfortunately, you might believe that possessing an impressive collection of art, baseball cards, or fast cars will garner the respect you seek now. However, many motivational gurus claim that a prosperity mindset has more to do with your self-worth than how much cash is actually in the bank. Author Miguel de Cervantes mused, The gratification of wealth is not found in mere possession or in lavish expenditure, but in its wise application. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
